org.apache.abdera2.common.protocol
Class BaseProvider

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.abdera2.common.protocol.BaseProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Provider, TargetBuilder
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractWorkspaceProvider
public abstract class BaseProvider
extends Object
implements Provider

Base Provider implementation that provides the core implementation details for all Providers. This class provides the basic request routing logic.
